      public static double getFlatDistanceSqr(double shootX, double shootZ, double velX, double velZ, double playerX, double playerZ)

    • calculateArrowClosestApproach

      public static net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d calculateArrowClosestApproach(net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d shootOrigin, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d shootVelocity, double yGravity, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d playerOrigin)
      Calculates where we think an arrow will "hit" us, or at least where it will be at its closest. Does so by figuring out the closest X-Z coordinate of the arrow's trajectory and then using the height of the arrow when it reaches that point as the result's Y value.

    • calculateArrowClosestApproach

      public static net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d calculateArrowClosestApproach(CachedProjectile projectile, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d pos)
